 
 
 
                                                                                                                      
Interruption of 
Electricity Supply 
Notice is hereby given under Rule 27 of the Electric Power Rules 
That the electricity supply will be interrupted as here under: 
(It is necessary to interrupt supply periodically in order to 
facilitate maintenance and upgrade of power lines to the network; 
to connect new customers or to replace power lines during road 
 construction, etc.) 
 NAIROBI REGION 
AREA: LUCKY SUMMER ESTATE  
DATE: Wednesday 18.08.2021                           TIME: 9.00 A.M. – 5.00 P.M. 
Part of Lucky Summer Est, Lucky Summer Slaughter House & adjacent 
 customers. 
AREA: PART OF LAVINGTON, JAMES GICHURU 
DATE: Wednesday 18.08.2021                           TIME: 9.00 A.M. – 5.00 P.M. 
Part of Olenguruone Ave, Gatundu Close, Part of Mzima Springs Rd, Part of 
Tende Drive, Part of James Gichuru Rd, Muthangari Police, Kabaserian Ave, 
Kanjata Crescent, Loreto Convent Sch, Mpampane Ave, Apple Close, Maji 
Mazuri Rd, Convent Drive, Chalbi Drive, Njumbi Rd, Gatina Nairobi Water, 
Part of Gatina Kawangware, Musa Gitau, Part of Ewaso Nyiro Rd, Vatican 
 Embassy, St. Mary’s Sch, Kangemi Waruku & adjacent customers. 
AREA: BOMAS OF KENYA, MUIRI ROAD 
DATE: Wednesday 18.08.2021                           TIME: 9.00 A.M. – 5.00 P.M. 
Citam Langata Rd, Nyumba Kumi, Muiru Rd, Bomas of Kenya, Forest Edge 
 Rd & adjacent customers.  
AREA: PART TASSIA 
DATE: Wednesday 18.08.2021                           TIME: 9.00 A.M. – 5.00 P.M. 
Tassia kwa Ndege, Penda Hosp, Mwalimu Court, Tassia Mosque, Tassia Hill, 
Victory Learning, Amani Court, Church Court, Afya Court, Avenue Park 1 & 
2, Tumaini Est, Stage Mpya Pipeline, Mhindi Mweusi, Lexo, NGO & adjacent 
 customers. 
AREA: PART OF NGONG ROAD 
DATE: Thursday 19.08.2021                               TIME: 9.00 A.M. – 5.00 P.M. 
Part of Ngong Rd, Miotoni Rd, Lenana Sch, Ngong Racecourse, Ngando, 
Dagoretti Corner, Equity Bank, Family Bank, Metrological, Jamhuri Show 
 Ground, BM Security, Polo Club, Lexo Petrol Stn & adjacent customers.

For further information, contact 
 the nearest Kenya Power office
